title: Rashed Abdullah
description: RashedAbdullah.com showcases Rashed Abdullah's projects like a Madrasha data management app and a Quran reading tool. It features his YouTube channel for Nasheed and fosters tech collaboration via "Qawmi Developers Community.

title: Jamiatul Latif
description: Jamiatullatif.com is an educational platform for Jamiatul Latif Rupganj Madrasha, built with Next.js and MongoDB. It manages student data, tracks exam results, and shares updates, enhancing communication and learning.

title: Sihabul Khair
description: Sihabul Khair is a web app connecting users for charitable giving, featuring user registration, donation tracking, and project showcases. It streamlines donations, promoting community and generosity.
